{
  "Allegations" : "CLIENT INVESTED IN VARIABLE ANNUITY 01/05/2007.  CLIENT STATES IN MULTIPLE LETTERS PRODUCT WAS UNSUITABLE, RR MISREPRESENTED PRODUCT AND MONTHLY PREMIUMS WERE TOO EXPENSIVE.",

  "Broker Comment" : "CURRENT FIRM WAS NOT B/D WHEN PRODUCT WAS PURCHASED.  INSURANCE COMPANY RESPONDED TO COMPLAINT 08-26-08  AND 10-22-08 COPYING CURRENT BD ON SECOND RESPONSE.  INSURANCE COMPANY DENIED COMPLAINT STATING PRODUCT WAS IN LINE WITH CLIENT'S STATED GOALS AND OBJECTIVES, RR PROVIDED AMPLE DISCLOSURES AND NO MONTHLY PREMIUMS HAD BEEN PAID. NO EVIDENCE OF MISREPRESENTATION BY RR WAS FOUND. RR MET WITH CLIENT MULTIPLE TIMES TO EXPLAIN PRODUCT AND PROCESS PRIOR TO SIGNING INITIAL PAPERWORK. PRODUCT TOOK ANOTHER MONTH TO BE ISSUED.
